title:
Microsoft Purview | Endpoint DLP - Classification globalization
support (CCJK) (U.S. Government clouds)
description:
Microsoft Endpoint DLP will support content authored using double-byte character sets in Windows devices (including Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and Japanese) in service workloads.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/endpoint-dlp-getting-started?view=o365-worldwide
GA date: November CY2022
